title: Twilio Chat App
description: This is a React Native application for chatting built with Twilio and the React Native Gifted Chat library. It allows users to engage in real-time text conversations after joining the channel.

title: Login Screen
description: In this screen user has to enter his/her username to start the conversation.

title: Dashboard
description: The dashboard displays the channel available for the chat.

title: Chat Screen
description:
This is the Chat Screen. 
 Here the user can chat with the other user
